column4: whats a good mp3 player with ipod support for ubuntu? and how come i dont see airport sniffer anywhere for me to open it
does ubuntu have a boot screen? anyway i can remove all the data being loaded and hide behind a bootscreen or naything?\
too many questions do this >>/msg ubotu ipod<< >>/msg ubotu mp3<< no idea about the airport stuff
so many questions so little time - install the boot up manager "bum" to control the programs that start when your machine starts
